item.title: é…ç½®UVç¯å¢ƒ
item.description:

1ã€è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡UV_INSTALL_DIR ä¸º F:\SoftwareData\uv

2ã€powershellè¿è¡Œ


[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("UV_INSTALL_DIR", "F:\SoftwareData\uv", "Machine")
[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("UV_CACHE_DIR", "%UV_INSTALL_DIR%\cache", "Machine")
[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("UV_PYTHON_BIN_DIR", "%UV_INSTALL_DIR%", "Machine")
[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("UV_PYTHON_INSTALL_DIR", "%UV_INSTALL_DIR%\python", "Machine")
[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("UV_TOOL_BIN_DIR", "%UV_INSTALL_DIR%", "Machine")
[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("UV_TOOL_DIR", "%UV_INSTALL_DIR%\tool", "Machine")

2ï¼ˆæ›¿ä»£ï¼‰ã€cmdè¿è¡Œ

@echo off
set "UV_BASE_DIR=F:\SoftwareData\uv"
setx UV_INSTALL_DIR "%UV_BASE_DIR%" /m
setx UV_CACHE_DIR "%UV_BASE_DIR%\cache" /m
setx UV_PYTHON_BIN_DIR "%UV_BASE_DIR%" /m
setx UV_PYTHON_INSTALL_DIR "%UV_BASE_DIR%\python" /m
setx UV_TOOL_BIN_DIR "%UV_BASE_DIR%" /m
setx UV_TOOL_DIR "%UV_BASE_DIR%\tool" /m
setx UV_DEFAULT_INDEX "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple" /m
